To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private LongLeggedDoji _longleggeddoji;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_longleggeddoji = LongLeggedDoji(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_longleggeddoji.IsReady)
{
    var current = _longleggeddoji.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.longleggeddoji = self.LongLeggedDoji(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.longleggeddoji.IsReady:
    current = self.longleggeddoji.Current.Value
